pullRequest.title: Fix extracting logic in dynamic filtering when integrated with filter pushdown
pullRequest.bodyText:
Test plan -

Integration Test
2.Test in internal verifier runs

== NO RELEASE NOTE ==

beforeCommit.message:
Fix extracting logic in dynamic filtering when integrated with aria

When integrating with aria, we extract dynamic filter and leave it in the filter node
and push the regular filters to table scan. The current extracting logic can't handle
conjunction dynamic filters like
'AND (($internal$dynamic_filter_function(VARCHAR 524, site_id)) OR (IS_NULL(site_id))))'

afterCommit.message:
Fix extracting logic in dynamic filtering when integrated with filter pushdown

When integrating with filter pushdown, we extract dynamic filter
and leave it in the filter node and push the regular filters to table scan.
The current extracting logic can't handle conjunction dynamic filters like
'AND (($internal$dynamic_filter_function(VARCHAR 524, site_id)) OR (IS_NULL(site_id))))'

nodes.bodyText:
Could you make the body of the SQL more readable?
SELECT * FROM
lineitem l1 LEFT OUTER JOIN part p1
ON l1.orderkey = p1.partkey AND p1.size = 47
INNER JOIN orders o1 ON l1.orderkey = o1.orderkey
AND o1.custkey = 397
LEFT OUTER JOIN part p2
ON p1.name = p2.name AND p1.partkey = p2.partkey
WHERE o1.shippriority = 0
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -43,4 +44,35 @@ protected Session getSession()
                 .setCatalogSessionProperty(HIVE_CATALOG, PUSHDOWN_FILTER_ENABLED, "true")
                 .build();
     }
+
+    @Test
+    // Mixed join could produce conjunction dynamic filters, we should be able to extract them out when integrating with filter pushdown
+    // In this query, it will produce:
+    // AND (($internal$dynamic_filter_function(VARCHAR 263, partkey)) OR (IS_NULL(partkey))))
+    public void testMixedJoin()
+    {
+        assertQuery("SELECT\n" +
+                "*\n" +
+                "FROM (\n" +
+                "(\n" +
+                "(\n" +
+                "lineitem l1\n" +
+                "LEFT OUTER JOIN part p1\n" +
+                "ON (\n" +
+                "l1.orderkey = p1.partkey AND p1.size = 47\n" +
+                ")\n" +
+                ")\n" +
+                "INNER JOIN orders o1\n" +
+                "ON (\n" +
+                "l1.orderkey = o1.orderkey AND o1.custkey = 397\n" +
+                ")\n" +
+                ")\n" +
+                "LEFT OUTER JOIN part p2\n" +
+                "ON (\n" +
+                "p1.name = p2.name AND p1.partkey = p2.partkey\n" +
+                ")\n" +
+                ")\n" +
+                "WHERE\n" +
+                "o1.shippriority = 0");

@@ -43,4 +44,35 @@ protected Session getSession()
                 .setCatalogSessionProperty(HIVE_CATALOG, PUSHDOWN_FILTER_ENABLED, "true")
                 .build();
     }
+
+    @Test
+    // Mixed join could produce conjunction dynamic filters, we should be able to extract them out when integrating with filter pushdown
+    // In this query, it will produce:
+    // AND (($internal$dynamic_filter_function(VARCHAR 263, partkey)) OR (IS_NULL(partkey))))

nodes.bodyText: move this comment to the body of the test

beforeCommit.message:
Fix extracting logic in dynamic filtering when integrated with filter pushdown

When integrating with filter pushdown, we extract dynamic filter
and leave it in the filter node and push the regular filters to table scan.
The current extracting logic can't handle conjunction dynamic filters like
'AND (($internal$dynamic_filter_function(VARCHAR 524, site_id)) OR (IS_NULL(site_id))))'

afterCommit.message:
Fix extracting logic in dynamic filtering when integrated with filter pushdown

When integrating with filter pushdown, we extract dynamic filter
and leave it in the filter node and push the regular filters to table scan.
The current extracting logic can't handle conjunction dynamic filters
